text:
- The Arcee organization
was founded about a year ago

to train specific language
models in the enterprise.

There's nothing that parallels
the AWS infrastructure
for training language models,

especially when you're
distributing training workloads
across multiple machines,
you need the networking to be working
very efficiently between those machines.
So Arcee used AWS SageMaker HyperPod

to train the SEC-70B
model that we trained,
which was a Llama derivative,
and we used SageMaker HyperPod

to essentially distribute
the GPU workloads
of training this large language model
across a number of different AWS machines.

SageMaker HyperPod lets us
reduce our training time
by up to 40% when compared to other
distributed training solutions.

And not to mention also,
the engineering effort

that you have to do to
set up these systems.

That's something that you don't
want to be doing in house.
